name: Paragon Espresso - set of four
description:
Elevate your espresso experience with the Paragon Espresso set. Featuring a patented chilling rock, this innovative tool is crafted from food-grade stainless steel with a durable titanium coating. The spherical shape and large surface area ensure rapid and even chilling, while the high-density liquid gel core maintains colder temperatures for longer, freezing faster than traditional alternatives.

Scientifically proven to capture and express up to 40% more aroma molecules, the Paragon Espresso enhances flavor preservation. The height-adjustable design accommodates various cups and coffee machines, and anti-slip grips ensure stability.

The 30mm chilling rock, designed specifically for espresso, is smaller than the Paragon Filter rocks, with additional rocks available for order.

Specifications:

  • Espresso Mount: (W) 34mm x (L) 120mm, Electrophoresis powder-coated Aluminium
  • Chilling Rock: (Diameter) 30mm, SUS304 Stainless Steel with Titanium Coating, liquid core of glycerin and water
  • Mount Grips: Silicone

All materials are food-safe, FDA approved, and waterproof.
